DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : Investigating effect sugar reduction apple juice glycemic insulin response ingestion drink . Subjects/Methods : In double-blind randomized placebo-controlled clinical trial cross-over design 30 male adult impair fast glucose ( IFG ) receive oral drink 500mL : 1 . Verum : Apple juice , treat ( low sugar content ) ; 2 . Control : Untreated apple juice ( normal sugar content ) . Capillary blood glucose venous plasma insulin measure twice baseline time 0 ( start drink ) , 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 120 min .
